lead_paragraph: A flock of Jacob sheep being raised by a British Columbia couple will be sent to their ancestral homeland in Israel this year.

headline.print_headline: Biblical Nomads Will Return to the Holy Land (Thank a Canadian Farm)
headline.main: Biblical Nomads Will Return to the Holy Land, Thanks to a Canadian Farm

snippet: A flock of Jacob sheep being raised by a British Columbia couple will be sent to their ancestral homeland in Israel this year.
abstract: Israeli couple raising heirloom Jacob sheep, named after Biblical patriarch, outside Vancouver, British Columbia plan to return animals to their ancestral home in Israel; Canadian zoos managed to preserve ancient breed, long extinct in Israel, which diluted as it spread across globe; novice shepherds had to persuade initially wary Israeli agricultural officials to accept sheep.
